name: screenlite
description: Screenlite is a self-hosted digital signage tool that allows displaying custom media and messages on remote screens. It includes scheduling and multi-screen management.
features: Digital signage: Display custom content on remote screens for advertising or information.
Content scheduling: Schedule media playback by time, date, or recurring patterns.
Multi-screen management: Control multiple displays from a centralized dashboard.
Media library: Organize images, videos, and web content in a centralized repository.
Playlist creation: Build playlists with transitions, durations, and playback rules.
Remote control: Update content and settings on displays without physical access.
Screen monitoring: Track display status, uptime, and playback health in real-time.
Layout templates: Create split-screen layouts with multiple content zones.
Web content: Display live websites, dashboards, or web apps on screens.
Emergency alerts: Override scheduled content with urgent messages or announcements.
User permissions: Assign roles for content creation, approval, and display management.
Analytics: Track content impressions and display performance metrics.
